name: Stoneform
description: The bindings of our world pull us together.
effect: Devotees of the Last Titan may call upon 'Stoneform' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to cleanse themselves of a single status condition, including those inflicted by other Boons. Usage of this boon increases by 1 with each rank. At Luminary, you may also remove a single stat debuff and are immune to the source of that Stat Debuff for the Combat.
